pullrequest.title: Model editor Part 1 - part and joint creation

content.raw: Currently it's not possible to add a 3D mesh located in a hidden directory. This might be a convenient feature for importing meshes from the .gazebo/models directory. That might be a feature request.
content.html: Currently it's not possible to add a 3D mesh located in a hidden directory. This might be a convenient feature for importing meshes from the .gazebo/models directory. That might be a feature request.
